siteDescription: Dopex is a maximum liquidity and minimal exposure options protocol

0.name: Offset Tail Risk
0.paragraph: Receive rDPX rebates on losses incurred. Use rDPX to mint synthetic assets.

1.name: More Liquidity
1.paragraph: Asset pools help source liquidity for on-demand option writing across option chains

2.name: Worry Less
2.paragraph: Minimize Exposure by earning DPX while providing liquidity.

body.paragraph: We built a protocol with vast improvements over the existing options market.

0.heading: Price Efficiency
0.paragraph: Discounted options with instant arbitrage opportunities.

1.heading: Deeper Liquidity
1.paragraph: Purchase and swap options with any strike price.

2.heading: Minimize Risk
2.paragraph: Offset risk and minimize losses as a liquidity provider with rDPX rebates.

3.heading: Constant Yield
3.paragraph: Earn DPX as rewards constantly when providing liquidity to Option Pools.

4.heading: Fully Collateralized
4.paragraph: All options have the collateral to back them, removing the risk of third-party defaults.

5.heading: Synths with rDPX
5.paragraph: Mint synthetic assets like stocks and indices using rDPX as collateral.

protocolUsage.uniswap: Dopex prepares assets post expiry from Uniswap to roll-over for next expiry.
protocolUsage.uma: Synthetic assets like indices, stocks are minted with rDPX as collateral on UMA.
protocolUsage.chainlink: Chainlink oracles provide Dopex with pricing and volatility data.

tokenModel.paragraph: Dopex utilizes two separate tokens to coordinate new ecosystem dynamics in a synergistic feedback loop.

dpx.description: DPX is the limited supply governance token.
dpx.paragraph: It accrues fees and revenue from pools, vaults and wrappers.

rdpx.description: rDPX is the rebate token for option writers.
rdpx.paragraph: It can be used to mint synthetic assets such as indices, stocks, etc.
